tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hotel (
    hotel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    total_rooms INT,
    total_floors INT,
    check_in_time TIME,
    check_out_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT,
    date DATE,
    electricity_consumed DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    water_consumed DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (hotel_id) REFERENCES hotel(hotel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Rooms (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_number INT,
    hotel_id INT,
    room_type VARCHAR(50),
    occupancy_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    entry_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT,
    room_id INT,
    energy_usage DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE guest (
    guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE hotels (
    hotel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    rating INT,
    num_rooms INT
)

CREATE TABLE rooms (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT,
    room_type VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT,
    guest_name VARCHAR(255),
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT,
    room_id INT,
    electricity_usage DECIMAL(10, 2),
    water_usage DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE staff (
    staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT,
    role VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    hire_date DATE
)
